revision.comment: Added the A_ChangeFlag version, and fixed the title typo.
revision.text:
{{DISPLAYTITLE:A_StalkerDrop}} '''A_StalkerDrop'''
(no parameters)
Removes the {{flag|NOVERTICALMELEERANGE}} and {{flag|NOGRAVITY}} flags from the calling actor. Pretty obviously, can be replicated with: A_ChangeFlag("NOVERTICALMELEERANGE", 0) A_ChangeFlag("NOGRAVITY", 0)
This codepointer is restricted to {{Class|Stalker}} and derived classes.
[[Category:Decorate Strife functions]] [[category:Decorate Status change functions]] [[Category:Decorate Restricted functions]]{{DEFAULTSORT:StalkerDrop}}
